values: Now, I'm not accusing anyone of anything. It's entirely possible that this is a coincidence. In fact, I'm sure that's what it is. Nevertheless, I am noticing CERTAIN SIMILARITIES between the aforelinked fic and THIS ONE which I wrote several weeks ago. Not that I'm accusing anyone of anything. I just strongly suggest that you go and decide for yourself.

Title: Leaden Author: Kayleigh Pairing: SS/HP Rating: R Summary: PWP. "Are you learning, Potter, finally?" Warnings: Chan (Harry is 14), dubious consent. "Potter. Wand away." Harry frowned, and his tongue darted over his upper lip. His wand was half-out of his robes, ready to cast a cleaning spell on Snape's enormous master cauldron. "Wha - Sorry, Professor, why -" His voice cracked, spiking from low and smooth to childish and squeaky. Snape swept forward menacingly, stopping less than a pace in front of Harry. Harry looked up at him, nervously. "You will not question me," Snape murmured, barely moving his thin lips. His tone was so knife-sharp, so dangerous, that Harry shivered reflexively. "You will clean it by hand," Snape said, turning away and superciliously flicking his fingers toward the cauldron. He strode back to his austere cherrywood desk and leaned against it, folding his arms across his chest and regarding Harry with just the slightest kink to his upper lip. Harry swallowed and turned toward the massive leaden cauldron. It was nearly big enough to hold him, and he'd have to hang over the edge to reach the bottom... Merlin. It was caked with a thick, pale-pink crust; Harry recognized it hazily as the remains of a burn salve; or was it an antibacterial lotion? A lingering sick-sweet scent rose from it, pleasant in an odd way. Looking back at Snape, he held open his slender hands to indicate that he had nothing to clean with. Snape's gaze dropped down Harry's body until it reached his feet, and Harry looked blank for a moment, staring down at his shoes before his shoulders slumped and he turned back. His own robes, then. Bastard. Gathering up the hem of his robes, he scrubbed at the thickest layer of crust, near the lip of the cauldron. It was dried on hard, so with a furtive glance back at Snape, he brought the hem up to his face and lashed his moist tongue over it, dampening the fabric. Harry heard Snape shift behind him, and was suddenly aware of the cold dungeon air on the backs of his calves; he felt exposed. Luckily, whatever the potion was seemed to be water-soluble; it began to flake off under the wet cloth. Still, it was slow-going. He scrubbed a wide path down into the belly of the cauldron; when he couldn't reach any farther on his feet, he hoisted himself up and hung onto the rim of the enormous bowl, his feet dangling in midair. The cauldron was still very warm from its last use. "Potter." Harry froze, his stomach hurting a little from the pressure of the sturdy cauldron lip. "Do you expect me to stay here to supervise you all night? And into tomorrow afternoon?" "I - Professor, I don't know how to do it any faster -" More shiftings behind him, and Snape's footsteps coming closer. Harry felt suddenly very vulnerable and rather embarrassed with his arse in the air and his legs splayed and dangling... And suddenly Snape was between them. Harry let out a small, squeaky whimper of breath. Snape's body pressed against him, warm - no, hot - as Snape bent around Harry's body and into the cauldron. "Then I suppose I shall have to teach you," he breathed, a rush of hot air against Harry's ear. A brief, high keening escaped from Harry's throat. The heavy fabric of Snape's robes scratched against Harry's bare legs, and his hips were right - there... "Long, slow strokes, Potter, or you risk scratching the surface; lead is a very soft metal." Snape wrapped his long fingers around Harry's small, bony hand and guided him, thrusting the both of them forward as he stretched out his arm to reach the opposite rim of the cauldron. Harry gasped softly as the pressure of Snape against him became overwhelming, and as Snape shifted, a hard point made itself known against the fleshy cleft of his arse. One of Snape's buttons must be caught between them, Harry thought. The spot it was rubbing was sensitive, soft... a spot Harry sometimes touched, fleetingly and with shame burning in his cheeks, late at night, with the tip of one moistened finger. He felt a tingling spark deep at the base of his spine, and flushed furiously as he turned his head away from Snape's. This was the wrong place entirely for that line of thinking. But the damage was done; Harry's prick swelled and throbbed, bumping half-hard against the lip of the cauldron. He'd been getting hard in all kind of inopportune situations lately, but this, of all places, with Snape right there... Snape moved against him once more, sweeping Harry's arm high up the side of the cauldron, and Harry's robes were pulled up even further by his forgotten scrubbing hand. Snape let out a tiny, surprising little sigh, and his hips moved, working the hard point deeper between Harry's thighs. Oh. Oh, God. That wasn't a button. It was hot, even through the thick drill of Snape's robes, and it was moving - just slightly, in time with Snape's pulse. Snape's heartbeat seemed all around him now, pounding against his back, against his thighs, shaking Snape's deadly-quiet voice ever-so-slightly as he said, "Are you learning, Potter, finally?" "Yes, Professor Snape," Harry said reflexively, his head dizzy with the scents in this cauldron, the humidity of Snape's breath against his face. His stomach was hurting badly, now, under Snape's weight, and he squirmed his hips uncomfortably. Suddenly, Snape drew a sharp breath. It seemed to slice, cold, across Harry's cheek, like a dagger. "You are learning," Snape said into his ear, voice broken and strangled, and his hips squirmed back. This was - Harry gasped, high and shallow - this was real, this was a man on him, against him, this was his cock hard, his skin tingling, his blood rushing loud in his head, his breath syncopated with the professor's. His first - "Yes," he whispered, and Snape's mouth pressed against the back of his neck. Any pretense of accidental contact was lost as hips shoved up against Harry roughly, and Harry gasped, his cock colliding with the cauldron's rim and throbbing sweetly. His mouth opened in a silent O as he rubbed through his robes against the rough-cast cauldron, still warm as flesh against him. Snape gave a sharp grunt and released Harry's hand - a strange, cold void was left there - and planted his hands, splayed and pale on either side of Harry, bracing himself against the cauldron. His hands were so handsome and strong up close like this, and why hadn't he ever noticed the sharp relief of bone under flesh, the vulnerable rivers of vein, the tendons stark and taut in his wrist? The friction of Snape's cock against him sent waves of heat shivering through him, peaking when it rubbed against his sensitive, puckered arsehole and when it slipped between his legs and bumped against this newly-discovered, incredible spot behind his balls. His hips twitched and writhed against the cooling cauldron. Snape shifted his weight, causing a flare of pain at Harry's stomach and a rough bump of the cauldron wall against his cock. One had left the side of Harry's head, and for a dizzy moment he feared that Snape would heave himself off of Harry and leave him, but instead the missing hand brushed - and then squeezed - against Harry's groin, and Harry groaned uncontrollably, and came hard and hot and fast and sweet inside his robes and against Snape's hand, grunting, "Oh fuck, shit. You -" "Language, Potter, fif - fifteen points," Snape murmured against the back of Harry's ear, his voice eerily calm, stammering only once as Snape gasped and caught his breath. Harry head pounded heavily for a moment; then he wrinkled his nose at the chemical-candy smell of the cauldron, as if he had only just noticed it was there. Snape's breath was loud and hot against him now, threading through his hair, and his robes were carving an almost painful itch against his backside. His weight seemed heavier than the cauldron, crushing, so awful and splendid at the same time. The clock on the wall seemed to suddenly start ticking, out of time and slower than Snape's thrust, whish were growing faster and harder and - With a loud, shuddery moan, Snape stilled against him, and heat seeped through two layers of robes and onto the raw skin between Harry's slim legs. And suddenly, he was gone. The force of Snape's departure knocked Harry off-balance and he fell into the cauldron, bumping his head against the side. Dull, red pain filled his head, and he shut his eyes, disoriented. Snape's footsteps echoed away for a moment then stopped - a rough scrape sounded, as though he had turned on his heel, and there was a murmured word that Harry couldn't decipher. Immediately a tingling raw burn washed over him, as if he'd just been scrubbed all over, and the tacky moisture was gone from between his thighs. He felt leaden and sore all over, limp. A door slammed. Harry let himself slide into the cauldron, curling up around himself, his mind quiet and sleepy, his heartbeat beginning to slow. He noticed with a faint smile that the Snape's spell had cleaned the cauldron, too.
